code: import instance from'constants/baseUrl';import{GET_LIST_POST,CREATE_POST,UPDATE_POST,GET_POST_BY_ID,LOGIN,REGISTER,UPDATE_PROFILE}from'constants/api_path';export var getPosts=function getPosts(){return instance.get(GET_LIST_POST);};export var createPost=function createPost(payload){return instance.post(CREATE_POST,payload);};export var updatePost=function updatePost(payload){return instance.post(UPDATE_POST,payload);};export var getPostById=function getPostById(postId){return instance.post(GET_POST_BY_ID,{postId:postId});};export var login=function login(payload){return instance.post(LOGIN,payload);};export var register=function register(payload){return instance.post(REGISTER,payload);};export var updateProfile=function updateProfile(payload){return instance.post(UPDATE_PROFILE,payload);};
